summary: This module implements dataset wrappers for PyTorch that allow combining multiple audio corpora, generating synthetic code-switched samples with language-aware segment selection, duration limits, normalization, pauses, scaling, and augmentation, and providing flexible concatenation with configurable sampling policies such as temperature-adjusted probabilities, random weighting, or deterministic round-robin.
business_intent: To simplify the creation of multilingual and code-switching speech training pipelines, giving developers a ready-made way to merge and sample diverse audio datasets, thereby accelerating model development for robust automatic speech recognition across languages.
